conbody.p: (a) Use the provision at 252.209-7008 , Notice of Prohibition Relating to Organizational Conflict of Interest—Major Defense Acquisition Program, if the solicitation includes the clause at 252.209-7009 , Organizational Conflict of Interest—Major Defense Acquisition Program; and

(b) Use the clause at 252.209-7009 , Organizational Conflict of Interest—Major Defense Acquisition Program, in solicitations and contracts for systems engineering and technical assistance for major defense acquisition programs or pre-major defense acquisition programs.
